comments:
Unpack and copy to the workspace UML.genmodel from uml2-SDK-2.0RC3a.zip\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.uml2.uml_2.0.0.v200605120024.jar\model.
Double-click on this file to browse it in the EMF editor - StackOverflowError appears, editor will not be opened. Not sure that it is a problem of EMF. I have emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.2.0RC4.zip installed and trying to open UML.genmodel from RC3a distribution.

Either EMF loader should be corrected or UML.genmodel should be updated to get rid of this error.

Sorry.  We added features to GenFeature so you'll need a UML2 that's compiled against this version of the base GenModel.  So you'll either need the next UML2 build, or should use the previous EMF build...
